chapters.title: Ghost Sources
chapters.description: Include citations to nonexistent or misrepresented sources

chapters.title: Patchwork
chapters.description: Combine properly cited material with copied material that is not cited.

chapters.title: Reuse
chapters.description: Borrow from your previous work without citations or permission

chapters.title: Mirror
chapters.description: Include a citation but use too many words from the original passage.

chapters.title: Thesaurus
chapters.description: Change a few words but retain the general structure of the source passage.

chapters.title: Bulk Copy
chapters.description: Copy/Paste large amounts of source material
